GSD.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v5.10.85
GSD.description:
net/sched: fq_pie: prevent dismantle issue

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.85 by commit 2a51edaf5cc563574878b93d7ef3d5955dda7030, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit ec97ecf1ebe485a17cd8395a5f35e6b80b57665a. For more details please see the references link.
